quotes.message: All prosperity begins in the mind and is dependent only on the full use of our creative imagination.
quotes.name: Ruth Ross

quotes.message: Prosperity is only an instrument to be used, not a deity to be worshipped.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.
quotes.name: Geoffrey F. Abert

quotes.message: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things. Poverty is a way of living and thinking, and not just a lack of money or things.
quotes.name: Eric Butterworth

quotes.message: Prosperity's right hand is industry and her left hand is frugality.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: To rejoice in the prosperity of others is to partake of it.
quotes.name: W. Austin

quotes.message: You can't borrow your way to prosperity.
quotes.name: Terry Branstad

quotes.message: Prosperity in the form of wealth works exactly the same as everything else. You will see it coming into your life when you are unattached to needing it.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Everything in the world may be endured except continual prosperity.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: There are many roads to prosperity, but one must be taken. Inaction leads nowhere.
quotes.name: Robert Zoellick

quotes.message: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider.
quotes.name: King Solomon

quotes.message: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: The fact is prosperity has a purpose. It's to allow us to pursue 'the better angels,' to give us time to think and grow.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Prosperity tries the fortunate: adversity the great.
quotes.name: Rose F. Kennedy

quotes.message: In prosperity prepare for a change; in adversity hope for one.
quotes.name: James Burgh

quotes.message: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.
quotes.name: Matt D. Miller

quotes.message: The desire for economic prosperity is itself not culturally determined but almost universally shared.
quotes.name: Francis Fukuyama

quotes.message: The world of prosperity maintains the world of adversity.
quotes.name: James Lendall Basford

quotes.message: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great.
quotes.name: Rose Kennedy

quotes.message: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A sustainable world means working together to create prosperity for all.
quotes.name: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.message: There is no way to prosperity, prosperity is the way.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Opportunity today, prosperity tomorrow.
quotes.name: Julian Castro

quotes.message: As much as we need a prosperous economy, we also need a prosperity of kindness and decency.
quotes.name: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.message: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things.
quotes.name: Eric Butterworth

quotes.message: Prosperity is the surest breeder of insolence I know.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: It is easy when we are in prosperity to give advice to the afflicted.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: True prosperity is the result of well-placed confidence in ourselves and our fellow man.
quotes.name: Benjamin Burt
